property.name: Text Box
property.value: KOLAT Open: Target a Personality: Reduce his Force to 0. Lose 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI SENSEI TACTICIAN LOYAL After Tamisu enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities. After your Tactical, Bushido Virtue, or Terrain action resolves: Give a Lion Clan Personality +1F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI TACTICIAN Uehara has +1F while he opposes a Phoenix Clan Personality. Limited: Look at the top card of your Fate deck. You may leave it there, discard it, or put it at the bottom of the deck.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: IMPERIAL ARMOR Melee Attacks targeting cards in this unit have -2 strength. Reaction: Before another player's action resolves: Negate this Personality's movement from the action's effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN AIR SHUGENJA ARTISAN

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN VOID MONK HENSHIN Reaction: After your Ring or Henshin (including Kikugoro) enters play or overlays: Look at the top two cards of your Dynasty deck. You may put one of them at the bottom of the deck.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN EARTH SHUGENJA INQUISITOR MAGISTRATE Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. You may target and straighten a Personality. If the enemy Personality is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: ASHIGARU This card has +1F for every two Farms you control.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: ASSASSIN DUELIST May not be included in decks.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Reaction: After another player's Political action targets your Personality: Negate its effects. Limited: Target a Kolat, Ninja, Shadowlands, or dishonorable Personality: His controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN COURTIER SAMURAI SENSEI EXPERIENCED THE STUDENT LOYAL After Kazutoshi enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities. Other players' Personalities in and out of play have their Honor Requirements increased by 10.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN COURTIER EXPERIENCED 2 Political Battle: Even if Nomen is not at the current battlefield, bow her and target a Personality: Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN SAMURAI MAGISTRATE PARAGON YOJIMBO LOYAL TASU'S SORROW Battle/Limited: Target a Personality, or one or two Personalities if you control a Courtier: You may target a Shadowlands Personality. Give each target -3F. If this is the Combat Segment, dishonor them.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: You may transfer a Spell from your Personality in this duel to another of your Shugenja at the same location. Battle: If you have not put cards into your hand this phase and you have attached a Spell this turn: Draw two cards.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: VOID Reaction: After an action resolves, bow this card and target one of your Rings the action bowed: Straighten the Ring. If this Shugenja is Void, you may destroy this card; if you did, you may use the Ring's base abilities an additional time this turn.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN DAIMYO SAMURAI IRON CRANE SCOUT LOYAL UNIQUE Reaction: After your Recon action from a Strategy resolves: Draw a card. Recon Limited: Discard a card: Search your Fate deck for a non-Unique card with a Recon ability, show it, and put it in your hand.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN IMPERIAL SAMURAI IRON CRANE SCOUT YOJIMBO Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow zero or more different cards in his unit up to the number of Recon actions you have taken this turn.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS SAMURAI COMMANDER CONQUEROR After Kazuko enters play: Lose 1 Honor. Fear Battle: You may destroy one of Kazuko's Followers: Melee 3 Attack, or Melee 6 Attack if you destroyed a Follower.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS SAMURAI CONQUEROR SENSEI LOYAL After Susaiken enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities. Once per turn, you may refill one of your provinces face-up.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SAMURAI PARAGON DARK PROPHET Reaction: After engaging at Tenbatsu's battlefield: Look at the top three cards of your Fate deck. Put them back in any order. You may discard a Dark Virtue; if you did, draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MAHO Limited: Once per game: Give this Personality a permanent Force bonus raising his Force to equal his base Gold Cost. Permanently give him Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni. Lose 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Political Open: Bow this card: Take the Imperial Favor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FIRE KIHO Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Monk: Give him two +1F Fire tokens. Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Destroy it if your Monk has any Fire tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WINTER TERRAIN After an action resolves: Bow any Personalities it moved. (Reactions trigger after traits.) Reaction: After a Battle action resolves, if there are no Terrains in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: VOID Limited: Bow this Shugenja and destroy this card: Search your Fate deck for a non-Unique Spell that must share a keyword with the performer unless he is Void, show it, and put it in your hand.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: IMPERIAL SAMURAI DUELIST MAGISTRATE May not be included in decks.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Paragon and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If he moved, bow him and negate his (future) movement. Lose 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: AIR After this card enters play, if this Shugenja is Air: Each other player loses 1 Honor. Open: Destroy this card and target a Personality: The performing Shugenja copies one of the target's abilities which does not copy abilities.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CAVALRY Battle/Open: Target your Personality: Transfer this card to him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CAVALRY As a Focus Effect: You may transfer a Follower from your Personality in this duel to another of your Personalities. Battle: Target a unit at the current battlefield: Move it home or to an adjacent battlefield.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: RONIN SAMURAI May not be included in decks.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL WINTER UNIQUE You may search your Fate deck for a non-Unique Strategy with a Political ability, show it, put it in your hand, and discard a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy card with lower Gold Cost: Bow it. Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Negate all current and new Force penalties to him from actions. Negate all current and new effects from other players' cards that prevent him from contributing Force to his army.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SPIDER CLAN SHADOWLANDS NINJA SHUGENJA After Gochiso enters play: Lose 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SHADOWLANDS NONHUMAN ONI After Gozaru enters play: Lose 5 Honor. After Gozaru is destroyed: It becomes discarded (not dead). Battle: Target one or two enemy cards: Bow them. If you only targeted one card, destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, lower the Gold Cost of its winner to 0. Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier or Magistrate and target a Personality: You may pay Gold equal to his unit's total Gold Cost minus 6. If you did, move him home. Otherwise, straighten his unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Destroy all non-Unique Holdings with a base Gold Cost of 0. Until the game ends, Holdings in and out of play have a minimum Gold Cost of 1.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MONK May not be included in decks.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN NONHUMAN DEER SPIRIT May not be included in decks. Limited: If another player has higher Family Honor than you: Gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NINJA Battle: Choose your performing Personality in a Ninja unit: Move him to the current battlefield. Straighten his unit if he moved.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN BERSERKER FRIEND OF THUNDER Reaction: After an action resolves that Bakishi performed and that destroyed a card at the current battlefield: The next time (this turn) another player's action targets Bakishi, negate its effects on him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN SAMURAI SENSEI LOYAL After Osote enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities. After the first time each turn another player's action targets your Crab Clan Personality at Osote's location: The player discards a card after the action ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: THUNDER As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, you may attach this card to one of your Personalities, ignoring Gold cost. Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 6 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN SAMURAI SCHOLAR SCOUT

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, give your Personality in it +3F. This card has +3F while defending. Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: BUSHIDO VIRTUE HONESTY Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: Bow him. Gain 1 Honor, or 3 Honor if your Family Honor is 9 or less.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FORTUNE UNIQUE Before you gain Honor from the Proclaim action, if the Personality's base PH is 3 or lower: Increase the Honor gain by 1. Open: Discard this card and target a Personality: He may not assign to, and will not move into, an attacking army.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN DAIMYO SAMURAI CAVALRY PARAGON LOYAL UNIQUE Battle: Target another Personality: Move him home or give him a Force bonus equal to his Personal Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI PARAGON

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN IMPERIAL SAMURAI ELITE SCOUT While you control a Terrain, your Ranged Attacks have +1 strength. Battle: Ranged 4 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: AIR RITUAL Your Air Shugenja have +1C. Limited: Bow one or more of your performing Shugenja with 10 or greater total Chi, and remove this card from the game: Create a province to the left of your leftmost province which permanently does not hold Dynasty cards.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Search your Dynasty deck for a Sensei Personality. Refill this province with him, face-up.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: EARTH FOREST While this Shugenja is Earth, your Spirits contribute Force to their army even while bowed. Battle: Even if this unit is not at the current battlefield, bow your performing Spirit and target an enemy card: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NINJA Reaction: After another player's Melee or Ranged Attack targets your Ninja: Show the card in the current battlefield's province. If it is a Personality, negate the Melee or Ranged Attack's effects. Battle: Discard a card in the current battlefield's province. Draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After an action resolves, if its player has resolved two or more actions which put cards into his hand this phase: He discards two cards. Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality: Move him there. Straighten him if he moved.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: EARTH Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy card: Bow it. If this Shugenja is Earth, gain 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After another player announces a Reaction during the Combat Segment: Its effects will not negate other effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN ELEMENTAL MASTER FIRE SHUGENJA LOYAL UNIQUE Limited: Bow Koiso, destroy your Shugenja with the base Fire keyword, discard a card, and target a non-Unique card without attachments in a unit: Destroy it. Battle: Target a card without attachments in a unit: Destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN FIRE SHUGENJA Battle: Target an attachment or token at the current battlefield: Destroy it. If this destroyed a card or token, give Mina two +1F Fire tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PHOENIX CLAN AIR SHUGENJA SENSEI LOYAL After Sanetomo enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities. Once per battle, one of your Phoenix Clan Shugenja may perform the Equip Battle action even if bowed and even if unopposed.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MONK PARAGON ORDER OF STRENGTH TACTICIAN EXPERIENCED AKODO ITOKU UNIQUE Itoku has +1F while a Lion Clan player controls him. Reaction: After an action resolves which bowed your non-Void Ring: Straighten it. You may use each of its abilities an additional time this turn

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN WATER SHUGENJA CAVALRY MASTER OF THE SWIFT WAVES

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN SAMURAI SIEGE TACTICIAN UNIQUE TOPAZ CHAMPION Battle: Ranged Attack with strength equal to the current battlefield's province's strength.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN SAMURAI SIEGE TACTICIAN Limited: If none of your provinces have been destroyed since your last turn began, or you are a Scorpion Clan player: Gain 2 Honor. Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN SAMURAI DUELIST SENSEI LOYAL After Gonji enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities. Before you focus: Once per duel, instead of focusing that time, you may give your Crane Clan Personality in the duel +4 to his duel stat until the duel ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN COURTIER STORYTELLER After a Battle action targets Kae, you may discard the Imperial Favor: If you did, negate Kae's destruction, bowing, and movement from the action's effects. Battle: Move Kae home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRANE CLAN SAMURAI DUELIST MAGISTRATE Iaijutsu Reaction: After an action resolves during which Kenta won a duel, target a dishonorable enemy Personality at the current battlefield: Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: You may choose (now) to use the base Force of your Personality in this duel as his duel stat if he is at a battlefield. Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Straighten him. You may move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: LION CLAN WATER SHUGENJA SODAN SENZO Battle: Bow Miro: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Lion Clan • Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality at the current battlefield. Remove him from the game after the battle ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN COURTIER DUELIST MAGISTRATE EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Iaijutsu Reaction: After an action resolves during which Daisuke won a duel: Draw a card.

Political Battle: Target an enemy Personality and you may discard the Imperial Favor: Bow the target. Move him home if you discarded the Favor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN EARTH SHUGENJA Reaction: After Haruki enters play: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Deer • Spirit Personality with the ability, 'Limited: If another player has higher Family Honor than you: Gain 2 Honor.'

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE After your action resolves that destroyed any Personalities: Remove them from the game. Battle: Choose your performing unbowed attacking Personality, target an enemy card, and discard this card: Bow the target. After the next time (this turn) it straightens, destroy it.

property.value: LION CLAN SAMURAI ANCESTOR SPIRIT May not be included in decks.

After a card is destroyed: Give Makito +1F. Maho Battle: Target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Chi: Destroy a card without attachments in his unit; this destruction will not be negated or delayed.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: PEARL While this Shugenja is Nonhuman, he has +2F. Open: Give this Shugenja -2F: He changes shape. Give him Cavalry. Battle: Give this Shugenja -2F: Ranged 6 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN SAMURAI DUELIST SENSEI LOYAL After Hikaro enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities. Before you focus in a duel involving your Dragon Clan Personality: Once per duel, you may focus from your discard pile instead. Remove that card from the game after the duel ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN SAMURAI KENSAI Battle: Target an enemy card with equal or lower Force: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN THUNDER SHUGENJA NAVAL Battle: Bow Tomiko or one of her Spells: Ranged 6 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN SAMURAI TACTICIAN Battle: Even if Isul is at home, target a Personality: Bow or straighten him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN WATER SHUGENJA CAVALRY DEATH PRIEST EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Reaction: When paying for a Spell attaching to Rani, remove a dead Personality in your discard pile from the game: Reduce the Spell's Gold Cost by the Personality's Chi. Battle: Even if Rani is bowed: Straighten her. You may move her home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Kensai: Move him there. Straighten his unit if he moved. Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Kensai and target an enemy Personality with lower Force: Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: BANDIT Battle: Bow this card: Melee 3 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NINJA Will only attach to a Ninja. This card has a Force bonus equal to its Personality's base Force.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FIRE While this Shugenja is Fire, he has Duelist. Battle: If this Shugenja is unbowed, bow this card and target an enemy Personality: This Shugenja duels him. Destroy a card without attachments in the unit of the duel's loser.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DARK VIRTUE PERFECTION Battle/Limited: Choose your performing Samurai: Give each Personality and Follower in his unit a Force bonus equal to its current Force. Before this turn ends, destroy his unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After another player's action targets your Personality: Discard him. Battle: If there are any enemy units at the current battlefield: Create a 1F/1C/1PH Monk Personality on your side there. Remove him from the game when the turn ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FEAR NINJA Battle/Open: Bow your performing Ninja Personality and target a Personality: Bow him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: EARTH TATTOO Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tattooed Monk: Give him +3F. If he is Earth, you may target and bow an enemy card without attachments.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Other players' cards' effects will not discard cards from your hand. Your maximum hand size is increased by 1. Other players' maximum hand sizes are reduced by 1, to a minimum of 7.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality with 7 or higher base Force and target two enemy Personalities, each with unit Gold Cost lower than your performer's Gold Cost: Bow one of them. Ranged Attack with strength equal to the first target's Force, which may only target the other Personality (if legal).

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality with fewer keywords, ignoring 'Soul of' keywords: Bow all cards without attachments in his unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After a Melee or Ranged Attack is targeted: Give it +2 or -2 strength. Battle: Ranged 3 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: Before your Personality in this duel is destroyed for losing it, you may destroy one of his Followers; if you did, negate his destruction. Open: Target one or two Followers in your discard pile: Put them into your hand.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target an enemy Personality: Move him to the current battlefield. Straighten his unit unless he is dishonorable, Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CULTIST GAIJIN Reaction: After an action resolves that Rata performed and that destroyed a Personality: Rata sacrifices his victim's corpse. Draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: IAIJUTSU Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality: Your Personality duels the target. Bow the duel's loser. Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Battle: Bow your performing Courtier at any location and target a Personality: Move him home. Reaction: Before another player's Battle action resolves, target a Personality: Negate his movement to the current battlefield from the action's effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: VOID KIHO RIDDLE UNIQUE Limited: Bow your performing Henshin, remove this card from the game, and target a Personality that shares a keyword with your Henshin: Put all cards in the target's unit at the bottom of his owner's appropriate decks in any order.

property.name: Text Box

property.name: Text Box

property.value: MONK ORDER OF STRENGTH TACTICIAN ZEALOT EXPERIENCED AKODO ROKKU UNIQUE Rokku has +1F while a Lion Clan player controls him. Reaction: Even if Rokku is bowed, after engaging, if any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Move Rokku there. Straighten his unit if he moved.

property.value: WEAPON Battle: Melee 4 Attack, or Melee 5 Attack if the target is Cavalry.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: RECON Reaction: After engaging, if you are the Attacker, choose your performing unbowed Scout at the current battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Choose and look at two cards in the Defender's hand. You have the first chance to take a Battle action in this battle, which must be performed by that Scout.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if your Personality won it, gain 1 Honor. Battle: If you are the Defender: Look at the top four cards of your Dynasty deck. If one of them is a Personality, you may put him into play at the current battlefield, ignoring Gold cost. Put the remaining cards back in any order. Discard him after the battle ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: Until this duel ends, give +1C to each Weapon attached to your Personality in this duel. Battle/Open: Target one or more of your Items: Straighten them. You may transfer them to other Personalities you control.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: VOID KATA Limited: If this card is in play: Look at the top card of any deck. You may put it at the bottom of that deck. Limited: Put this card into play. Discard all your other Kata (in play).

Shadow Dragon's abilities will not be copied. Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Permanently give him Ninja and Shadowlands. Take control of him. property.value: SPIDER CLAN KENSAI MONK ORDER OF THE SPIDER Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Give him -4F. If his Force is now 0, you may take an additional Battle action which Sugihara must perform.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: RECON Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing unbowed Scout at the current battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Ranged Attacks from your card effects during this battle have +2 strength.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CASTLE Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold. Limited: If you have fewer provinces than each other player, or exactly one province, choose your performing Siege Personality: Give him Conqueror.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TACTICAL Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician at any location and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. Bow him if he moved.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN EARTH SHUGENJA CAVALRY MOUNTAINEER

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CASTLE TEMPLE After the first time each turn you bow this card: Gain 1 Honor. Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TEMPLE Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold. Open: Choose your performing Monk or Shugenja: Give him Air, Earth, Fire, or Water.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FARM Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold. Battle: Bow this card: Give each of your Ashigaru cards at the current battlefield +1F.

card.name: The Ancestral Sword of Hantei - exp

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WEAPON EXPERIENCED UNIQUE AKKUAI-UO Will only attach to a Spider Clan Personality. This card has +1F for each Spider Clan Personality you control. After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor. Battle: Target a card in a unit: You may destroy it if it is bowed or an attachment. Bow it. Straighten this Personality.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WINTER Personalities and Followers have -1F. All players have the ability, 'Open: Bow your Stronghold: Discard a card titled The Bite of Winter from play.' Limited: Put this card into play.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if your Personality lost it, give one of your Personalities two +1F Revenge tokens. Battle/Open: Choose your performing Personality: Straighten his unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FOREST SINGULAR Open: Bow this card and target one or two attachments: Bow them.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: IMPERIAL POLITICAL UNIQUE Limited: Target another player's Personality, pay Gold equal to his unit's total Gold Cost, and discard the Imperial Favor or bow a Personality with five or more Force: Lose 2 Honor and destroy the target; these effects will not be negated.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL WINTER Limited: Discard the Imperial Favor and target an attachment: Destroy it. Battle: Choose your performing Courtier at any location, bow him or discard the Imperial Favor, and target an enemy Personality: Bow him. His controller loses 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Your Tacticians have the ability, 'Tactical Open: Give this Personality +1F and Cavalry.'

property.name: Text Box
property.value: After you announce a Terrain action: Once per battle, you may ignore any of its restrictions that are based on another Terrain being in play. After the first time each turn one of your Terrain actions resolves: Draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: THUNDER Limited: Bow this Shugenja unless he is Thunder, and target a Personality: After the next time (this turn) he assigns or an action resolves which moved him to a battlefield, bow him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: You do not lose Honor from Spider Clan and Fate cards you own. You may use the rulebook Conquest ability twice per turn during the same battle. Equipping Followers is a Battle/Limited ability for you.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Until the game ends, other players' actions will not discard cards from your hand, and if a player has resolved two actions that put cards in his hand in one phase, no more cards will be put into his hand that phase.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WINTER Reaction: After engaging: The current battlefield's province has a maximum strength equal to its base strength until the end of the battle. Negate the next effect that would move one of your Personalities from its battlefield. After the next time this battle a Terrain enters play, destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WATER As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, you may attach this card to one of your Water Shugenja, ignoring Gold cost. This Shugenja has +2F. Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Reduce its Force to 0.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SWAMP TERRAIN After this card enters play: Choose and bow an enemy card at the current battlefield. Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN WATER MONK TATTOOED Battle: Even if Rikyou is bowed, if any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Move him there. Straighten his unit if he moved.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: VOID MONK SHUGENJA BROTHERS OF REBIRTH EXPERIENCED ISAWA TOKIKO UNIQUE Tokiko has +1F while a Phoenix Clan player controls her. Battle/Open: Destroy Tokiko and target your dead Personality: Bring him into play in your home or at the current battlefield, paying all costs but paying 7 less Gold.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Spirit and target an enemy Personality: Bow him or destroy one of his attachments.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI NAVAL SENSEI LOYAL

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI SCOUT NAVAL After Shichiro enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities. After a Ranged Attack action resolves that your Mantis Clan Personality performed: Once per battle, you may move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI NAVAL SCOUT EXPERIENCED UNIQUE Battle: Twice per turn: Ranged 4 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Limited: Target a province whose player has two or more provinces: During your next normal Attack Phase (this turn), create two battlefields associated with it instead of one.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Reaction: After an action targets your Commander: Negate his movement from its effects. Battle: Target your Follower: You may take an additional action to use one of its base abilities, even if it is bowed or has already used the ability its maximum number of times this turn.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Give him the ability, 'Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Destroy him.'

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN SAMURAI BATTLE MAIDEN CAVALRY PARAGON While Lishan is attacking, she has +1F and +1PH. Reaction: After you announce a Battle action, if Lishan is at the current battlefield, target a Personality or Follower opposing her: Give it a Force penalty equal to Lishan's Personal Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SHADOWLANDS After this card enters play: Lose 1 Honor. This Personality has Conqueror. Battle: Melee 4 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN COURTIER KOLAT MERCHANT Your Holdings enter play paying 1 less Gold. Battle: Even if Makoto is at home, bow her and target an enemy Personality: His controller may pay 4 Gold; if he did, he loses 1 Honor. If he did not, dishonor the target and move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Yojimbo, and target an enemy card with Force lower than your Yojimbo's Force plus the highest Chi among all Shugenja and Courtiers you control: Bow the target. Destroy it if it has no attachments.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI BRUTE EXTORTIONIST MAGISTRATE NAVAL Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments, and you may pay Gold equal to its Gold Cost: Bow it. If you paid the Gold, destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Choose your performing unbowed Paragon and target an attachment with Force equal to or lower than your Paragon's Personal Honor: Destroy it.
